11/09/2017 ELODIE S : point avec Mr Cronne suite aux problèmes de corrosion. Toujours des alertes corrosion : la dernière provenant d'un équipementier PSA basé en Espagne. Mr Cronne a également observé des pièces corrodées dans l'atelier. Proposition d'analyse de surface de 2 lots de pièces.

20/07/2017 ELODIE S : visite suite à un nouveau problème de corrosion chez PSA Sochaux : proposition d'utiliser des housses F(H) car pièces chaudes en sortie séchage et les housses peuvent rester ouvertes plus de 48h (week-end) et rappel sur les 2h de saturation des VCI, point qu'il lui était inconnu. Voir CRV 

16/05/2017 JEROME V : Point téléphonique avec M. Cronne. Pas de nouvelles alertes corrosion depuis cet envoi de mi décembre. Les contacts qualité PSA basés à PLIP n'arrivent pas à avoir d'informations complémentaires pour M. Cronne. Avant cette expé, de nombresues autres sans problèmes. Proposition à M. Cronne de demander un relevé de l'eau pour Novembre, Décembre et Janvier afin de voir la qualité de l'eau utilisée. Le problème est sûrement autre car environ 50% des pièces concernées. Donc étonnant. Les pièces ont été envoyées avant les fêtes en France et sont arrivées en Chine lors du Nouvel an chinois. Il est donc possible que ces pièces soient restées plus de temps sur les ports, .... A suivre. M. Cronne doit me recontacter dès réception des relevés d'eau ou en cas d'un autre problème

11/05/2015 JEROME V : Thierry Jublot nous a contacté Jeudi 7/05 pour question. Afin de reprendre contact avec le client et voir les évolutions de l'usine, JV propose une rencontre dès le lundi 11/05 car projet urgent. AxleTech doit expédier des ponts dont l'extrémité doit être protégée par un sac VCI. Les sacs utilisés pour les autres applis ne conviennent pas. JV va sur place avec gaine de laize 1000 mm car diamètre de 600 mm de l'extrémité. Dimension finalisée sur place pour le sac 1000 x 1550 mm. Des ponts doivent partir le 19/05. Vu l'urgence, JV propose l'envoi de 30 sacs échantillons pour protéger ces ponts et valider les dimensions (3 tailles de ponts mais diamètre des extrémités identique). Sacs commandés immédiatement en Pologne et expédiés le 12/05/2015 pour livraison le 19/05 max. Sacs livrés en tant qu'échantillons pour dépanner le client. Cette proposition d'Acobal a été fortement appréciée car le client pourra fonctionner malgré l'urgence (surtout avec les ponts de Mai, T. Jublot était assez inquiet sur la possibilité de les dépanner). 

Informations sur situation AxleTech : plus de problèmes de corrosion depuis dernière intervention de Acobal. Depuis le site de la PR a été rapatrié sur le site principal. Depuis 2 à 3 ans, AxleTech chôme régulièrement. Le CA a chuté d'un facteur 3 suite aux fortes baisses de ventes des véhicules des armées (baisse des crédits des armées) et AxleTech n'arrive pas à être plus présent sur le civil.

27/01/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Evy Deprez

Poclain provides about 30% of their total business. Sales in 2015 were sluggish, as export to US has dropped. Forecast for 2016 is positive, due to more sales to France. Bo-Solutions is a preferred supplier of Poclain and gets to quote first hand. The conversion rate in that case is almost 80%.

 

Other clients are: Qynetic (aerospace), Duracell (fine mechanics), Jan van Nul (small series).

 

Main suppliers of cast and froged iron are: SPX (Poland) and Alidor Claeys.

 

During the factory floor inspection corrosion was found on oarts coming from:

Brousseval: bags were not well closed, no external buffering against piercing.

Grandry (Poclain foundry):  bags were not well closed, no external buffering against piercing.

Information was passed on to ES to take charge.

 

Process issues: rainwater is used to fill the baths, RO installation is highly recommended!

 

Future projects:

Bo-Solutions will invest in more grinding machines, as demand is picking up in this area.

 

Proposed products ZE:

VCI canal board for shipments to Poclain. Sample was handed over on 03/02/16

18/02/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Colin Hartog - procurement manager

Colin replaces Theo Kiel recently. The communication with purchasing was difficult and slow. Now, Colin will help to clear up the open issue of the packaging material.

Discussed items:
- leftover material from GM Korea project could be used for another internal client. In case it is not:
       - stock of V450A bags: Acobal will take this back at full price.
       - stock of V250A sheets: as it is not a standard item, Acobal would take this back at 20% discount. We have another client but he uses V180.
       - BAI should arrange and account for the transport.
       - BAI receives upon arrival credit invoice.
 



07/10/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Kaspar Verhagen:

1) GM Korea project is running out. The last cylinder heads will be delivered by the end of this year. Kaspar did not know what the reason was, but decision was made at management level.

2) New project to Brasil in the pipeline. Details are not known yet, but VCI will be used for sure. In order to support BAI, I suggested that we do a validation and verification test. The validation test needs to be done at Excor lab. The verification test will be done by sending dataloggers on the transport rout to Brasil. Our local office will be asked to participate.

3) Wash baths: the bath is monitored on a weekly level by measuring conductivity, pH and %. Every month an in depth analysis is don by Surtec in their lab. In order to get optimal washing solution conditions, following actions are pending or under study:
- chemically clean the washing installation.
- build SPC monitoring system
- invest in new wash installation with build-in monitoring system

4) GM Korea project: corrosion has come down dramatically. Sometime, corrosion spots are discovered and reworked. As the project is running out, corrosion is not a less of a high priority at the moment. Kaspar said that they have learned a lot during the process, and that for future projects it will be easier to bring down the cost of non-quality.

5) Regarding the 15K credit ceiling, Kaspar advised me to contact the buyer Theo Kiel and ask him to get the contact person of the financial department in order to settle invoices.

6) Lasered canal board. Kaspar awaits the prices and quote details, so he can offer this as an emergency pack spec to GM.

Fédéral Mogul à Chasseneuil-du-Poitou : c'est fini

Les 241 salariés de l'usine Fédéral Mogul devraient recevoir leur lettre de licenciement le 9 octobre. Selon les syndicats, l'accord validant la fermeture définitive du site a été signé. La production va être délocalisée en Pologne et en Turquie.

  • Par Nicole Bremaud
  • Publié le 03 octobre 2014 à 10:21, mis à jour le 03 octobre 2014 à 10:26
101

© france 3 Le site de l'usine à Chasseneuil-du-Poitou

101
6 mois exactement après l'annonce par la direction du groupe de la cessation d'activité du site de Chasseneuil-du-Poitou, l'entreprise ferme définitivement ses portes. 

Les salaries ont accepté la prime supra légale que leur a proposé la direction.



Fédéral Mogul à Chasseneuil était le dernier fabriquant de piston alu en France. Les salariés ont dès l'annonce de la fermeture défendu leur outil de travail, manifesté. Ils ont réclamé une table ronde avec les constructeurs français. Ces fameux donneurs d'ordre, étant accusés par la direction du groupe d'être les responsables de la fermeture de l'usine de Chasseneuil, du fait de leur pression sur les prix,
La concurrence est permanente et l'usine poitevine était comparée avec plusieurs usines de son propre groupe, aux coûts de fabrication bien inférieurs.
Le groupe de Fédéral Mogul emploie 44 000 salariés dans le monde : Chasseneuil ne pèse que 0,5%
12/03/2013 : Sintertech quitte Federal Mogul pour rejoindre TMC (Thierry Morin C...)

13/05/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Nico Govaerts om Atlas Copco

Type of test :

Climate chamber test based on the ISO 60068-2-30 standard. We should do the same test than the previous one but maybe with 1 or 2 less cycles as we have seen that it was really severe.

Materials to test:

Cortec VpCI 126 bag (100µm), Zerust Valeno 450 Type F, Zerust Valeno 450 Type F(H)

Parts:

To be discussed with Atlas Copco. But why not the same type of parts than last time. As we know that Atlas Copco process is not good, we propose to work with at least 2 parts. One will stay in the delivering state and one will be cleaned in the lab. For the cleaning, we propose to clean them with a fresh bath of the washing liquid used by Atlas Copco and with DI water. We will just need some sample of the washing concentrate and the lab will do the bath and clean the parts. The target is to show them that VCI can work when the parts are cleaned and the process is under controlled. Regretfully, AC does not want to collaborate here and only wants to test production parts. NIco proposes to do a test on clean parts after we have done the climate test. We could do this on the clean and unrusted areas on the parts

Additional information:

The thickness of the film will not significantly impact the results (especially when the difference is not too big) during a long climatic test. We have more humidity developing in the packaging by condensation than humidity entering by permeability of the film. Valeno Type F(H) is the new chemistry we have proposed to Atlas Copco as it should when the film is in close contact with the metal area with a lot of humidity. We have in this chemistry more contact inhibitors and more water soluble inhibitor which are able to inhibit the water in contact with the film. The Valeno Type F(H) cannot be produced in Valeno 320 so we have to work with 450. To compare, in good way, to Valeno Type F the efficiency of Valeno Type F(H), I propose to work in both cases with Valeno 450.

NIco proposes to do a mechanical test on all the bags before we proceed to the CCT test. He sent a Cortec bag to Jérôme for these purposes. He also wishes to do a permeability test on the bags, but I said that we are not able to do this in our lab. He will contact the BVI or the University of Diepenbeek to do this.

In the end, we agreed on the following:
- Foresco, Acobal and AC will jointly pack the parts.
- Foresco, Acobal and AC will jointly inspect the parts in Dresden.

16/02/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Dieter Sadar

Dieter explained that Graco equipment is the Rolls Royce within its industry.

 

The stats showed that in 2% of the cases the deliveries of Acobal arrived late. This could be due to the desired delivery date, which sometimes is kept short. The ordering quantities also differ due to promotional campaigns.

 

Shorter delivery times are very welcome though. Stock holdings need to be minimized in order to lower the working capital requirements. A forecast is available!

 

Graco will launch in March a promotional campaign and the demand for VCI bags will most probably go up till the marketing effect fade away.

10/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ :  Meeting with Guy van Doorn

1) Project VMI Group

The following information should be submitted in order to bring down the barriers of the Quality engineer at VMI, Henk Dorst:
- Conformity of production certificate of the V450A film
- Proof of VCI effect: TL 8135-0002, nivel 3, TRGS 615
- Proof of mechanical properties compliance for V450

The fact is that Mr. Dorst claims that alufoil always has to comply with an international standard DIN55531. As a consequence, we have to convince Mr. Dorst that the film offered to Van Doorn has identical or better properties in the other countries where VMI is active: China and India.

Frank Hoebener was contacted accordingly, and this was his response:

Dear Jerome,

It doesn't look too difficult to me to solve this issue.

From my perspective it would be the best way to get a precise specification of the VALENO film from either you or from Excor.

Once we have this specification I can get in contact with our guys in India and China to tell them that they have to use the Excor masterbatch and exactly the same specification regarding the film manufacturing as provided.

If it is really impossible to explain the customer that our both chemistries will very likely work the same way but that we can guarantee the same physical properties of the firm we have to convince our Chinese and Indian partners to buy masterbatch from Germany.

This is in any case better than losing the business.

We can prove from both our labs the performance of both of our masterbatches and the quality of the local film manufacturing if needed.

Since Gary our man in China already uses and buys huge quantities of Excor's masterbatch I don't see any issue in both cases. Of course in India.  It's a totally different story but I'm sure that we can achieve an easy fast solution there as well.

Furthermore, I will add the following documents to make our case stronger:
- article of Excor on export packaging using VCI film

2) Experience with Metro film

Following problems occured:
- the film was staic and attracted a lot of dust when it was laid out on the factory floor
- scotch would not attach well on the film, making it difficult to close the film with tape
- the rolls were loose and would unroll easily

Van Doorn has given Metpro the last warning.

20/06/2017 JEROME V : Echange Téléphonqiue avec Sylvain : changement des bains de lavage avec de l'eau osmosée. Protection avec de l'huile des pièces en interprocess sur une mousse et plus sur carton et palette. Pour les pièces qui partent en maritime, le temps de refroidissement des pièces est supérieur que par le passé pour aussi laisser le dewatering s'évaporer. Réorganisation du poste conditionnement afin de mieux laisser refroidir les pièces. Après visite de Sylvain chez CAT à Arras, il a découvert que les exigences de CAT sont supérieures à avant car les pièces partent à Grimbergen et les exigences de Grimbergen sont supérieures : pas un seul point de corrosion autorisé !!! Des analyses de Kluthe ont été aussi effectuées et confirment le taux de chlorure élévé dans les bains. Par contre, Kluth semble maintenant préconiser une concentration max en Chlorure de 50 ppm et a changé aussi ses tolérances de concentration de lessive. Sylvaon doit les recontrer le 21/06. Il se demande si le produit n'a pas un peu changé sans en être informé.

04/05/2017 JEROME V : Envoi des premiers résultats sur 3 échantillons de bains. Un des bains réalisé avec de l'eau du robinet contient plus de 200 ppm de chlorure et plus de 500 ppm de sulfate après 5 semaines d"utilisation !!

18/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Theo Pack and Rakesh Soekhoe

Seals are used for ship screws and water pumps. Most are made from brass.

New project: IHC Merwede. Here the seals are made from carbon steel.

Process is as follows:
 
Inbound local suppliers - QC - Degreasing - Cleaning w. cloth - passivation - packing. Some parts stay in stock for longer periods. Also, the suppliers do not get specific instructions to passivate the parts. They use oily protection most of th time.

They are interested, on top of using the VCI bags, to protect the metals surface as the surface condition is not always optimal.

Proposed products: Perigol 230 and Spray-G. Samples and quote have been send already.

06/04/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Bert vanderhaege, Roger Doerenberg / Martijn Den Older

Corroison problems still occur with shipmentsto the SCSI facility. Bert claims that parts are sometimes for more that 6 months to a year in storage. The subcontrcators are some sort of a warehouse. Roger agress with him and will  take steps to shortne the storage time and deliver batch size quantities instead of large production lots.

Thye immediate effcet is that the throughput time of the parts is long and unclear, FIFO is not always respected at the painting company De Bruyn and the surface condition of the parts cannot be guaranteed any
more.

Main parts that are affected by this are: lobeweigt, Hitch and slowbox for CAT

another eason for corrosionis the rusty metal containers at Componenta. These containers are stored outside and unfinished and finished parts are shipped and stored in these boxes at the foundery.

Another reason could be the shot blast installation. Roger will check whether the compressed is dry and oïl free.

In general, the employees at Componenta should be more proactive in detecting and avoiding corrosion.

The discussion on the preservation oïl goes on. Ad Kouwenberg at componenta is testing the following brands:
- Kluthe, Bechem and 2 other suppliers.

Regarding the process fluids at Flexis, Gino Raemdonk of Klutherecommended to measure the Conductivity, Concentration of the baths on a daily basis. Flexis is following up this advise. Baths are also changed every 2 to 3 weeks , when the values are beyond the specs.

15/03/2016 ANTHONY VZ : meeting with Wilfred Reker

Joint meeting with Chemetall on corrosion problem parts Orange.

 

Apparently, after cleaning the parts in a wash process with Ardrox detergent line, corrosion occurs after the last bath. The product is Ardrox 3968and contains amines. The issue is that carbohydroxide evaporates form the product up to 48 hour after treatment.

 

It is clear form the eeting that Chemetall should optimize the cleaning process, as this was not done formerly. MF Elburg took over the cleaning line for a German company and implemented the same process flow. Chemetall claimed that the process fluids used are not optimal and that some need to be updated. Chemetall has new products on stock that can do the job a lot better.

 

To support Wifred Reker, I sent him the packaging instructions guide.

 

At the same time,  Henk Land passed me an order for Abrigo paper, VCI sheets and VCI bags.

30/10/2015 ANTHONY VZ : 

Meeting with Desmond Goossens and Joost van Dinther

 

The company is becoming less dependent on the automotive industry. DAF is still with 40% their biggest client. A bakery machine manufacturer is becoming second best.

 

In 2016 60% comes from automotive. Next year, this should be 40%, While the parts for machine manufactures should account for 55% of the business.

 

 

Consumption VCI down

 

For DAF, they are switching form EURO v to EURO VI parts. Here, no VCI is needed as most of the parts are treated with permanent corrosion protection. On top a small tube, for which they used a lot of VCI Bags was eliminated in the new engine.

 

New project

 

Next year, they will start machining at full scale and start assembling. The component has the following dimensions: 900 x 900 x 700.

 

It is not clear yet what the final pack spec will be, but I offered to deliver free samples as soon as the need to supply the first parts.

 

DAF Brazil

 

Only 700 parts are scheduled for this year. That means that DAF is assembling 700 trucks at Metalsa. Next year, Joost expects to ship 2 boxes per month to Brazil. The project is not taking off.

 

Process liquids

 

Bechem is under test right now. There has not been made a final decision yet. However, many parts are shipped without being cleaned. Her, there is a high risk, if parts are not protected with a proper RP.

The following samples were produced by Excor

1. Size 300x170mm  100my –  0,42 EUR/pcs
2. Size 300x170mm    80my – 0,40 EUR/pcs
Diameter=300mm  hole=170mm

The possible savings could be as high as 20%. This would certainly help to retain the client, as DMN, their end client, was aleady looking around for alternative sources. Meilink also asked a quote to B&H, but they were not avble to submit a satisfatory quote.

Issues:

3) Shipment of bare springs to other clinets are done in coating. Only, WP Springs requires oïl free springs.

4) Current VCI needs: they have enough VCI bags at the moment.

12/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Victor Azuogu and Jos Pellenkoft

1) Project GM - inserts + V250 sheets for collective packaging

The project was approved. The volume will be about 400 units per order. Now, MTEE wants to receive samples of the inserts and V250 sheets to make a prototype packaging.

2) Daimler M264: V320ESD 500 x 800mm bags have been quoted. The initial quantityis 2000 units/annum. Color should be PINK.

3) BMW S55 + B48: V320ESD bags should be offered. The excat size is not clear yet. MTEE would use the same bag for teh Baumler and BMW project, but this is not economical at the high projected consumption levels of 500K in 2019/2020. Same os for the other project, color should be pink.

4) VW AG project: Test will be performed soon to send the protos to AUDI, VW and Skoda






04/09/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Victor Azuogu and Jos Pellenkoft

1) Forecast V320F bags: the forecast only includes the LT3 project of VW. It does NOT include internal usage, which can vary vastly. Jos Pellenkoft asked to have a security stock of at least 50K, so it meets the internal demand.

>>>>> security stock of 50K confirmed to Jos Pellenkoft on 29092015

2) MB project: the 500 x 800 bags will have to be ESD safe as well. Shelf life is an issue, which will have to be verified. The most economical version would be a V320FESD. In the meantime, Jos aleady ordered 2500 pieces for testing purposes Start of the project is 04/16.

>>>>> MTEE: CCT validation test required

3) Audi, VW and Skoda project: The forecast for the following sheet is between 1000 to 2000 per year:

Sheet ZERUST® Valeno® 320 Type F 3000 x 2400 mm

Victor needs 12 samples, so he can send 3 boxes to each of the manufacturers. The sheets have been ordered and sent already.

4) GM project: We quoted canal board inlets to MTEE, offered by Gekoplast. They will compare these with the current cardboard version. Volumes are not high as this is an emergency pack. spec. MTEE will have to make a comparison between:
- individual packing: 72 VCI bags, Cardboard inserts
- global packing: 6 VCI sheets, 1 PE cover, PP inserts

5) BMW project: Here we offered an ESD and High shield version aleady. Now, they want to employ a V320FESD, as in the case of MB. A trial order for 2500 bags of 700 x 700 mm was placed last week.

26/08/2016 ANTHONY VZ :  Telephone conversation with Hans de Jong

Further to my proposal to use Abrigo paper for transport to a client in Germany no corrosion occured during the winter season.

Hans explained that since they payspecial attention to the temperature of the parts, no corrosion occurs. In summer, corrosion very seldomly happens. It is in wintertime, that they have to be more careful. 

25/09/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Telephone call  with Hans de Jonge

Corrosion occurs with deliveries to Germany. Issue could be due to high humidity lever of the season.

Following recommendations:
- check temperature parts (100%) Tpart = Troom
- put Abrigo paper sheets ibetween the different layers

04/12/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Hein Torrelle

1) Sales volumes of Picanol have been astonishing high this year. Normal volume reaches 6000 units per annum. In 2015 more than 8000 machines were delivered. Demand in China is sipping away, interesting markets are Cambodia, Vietnam, Turkey,  Pakistan and India. The Chinese subsidiary has not performed very well as demand was higher for high end machines, instead of the lower end produced in Suzhou.

2) Volume at the foundry has been satisfactory. Although the general industry demand dropped, this was counteracted by the increased volume at Picanol. Ingersoll Rand, Atlas Copco, Cat and Agro have been demanding less cast iron parts.CAT volumes dropped by 40%. Hein explained that CAT is increasingly delocalizing the production of parts to China. In his opinion they enter the subcontracting market at a very late moment.

The general impression is that volumes for the foundry will most probably drop a little.

3) New investments at Proferro. Due to lack of metal grinding capacity, 8 trcks go to Germany every week. The issue is that the parts are not packed in VCI. Also, the storage capacity is insufficient. Cast iron is stored outside without any protection. Proferro does shotblast the parts to remove the corrosion. Hein claims that corrosion comes right back after some time, like it is sweating out of the cast iron skin. The main reasi¡on is, that lamillar cast iron is produced and this is very prone to corrosion, especially after contaminants and water have penetrated into the cavities and the shotblasting process has not entirely removed this.

I urged Proferro not to store lamillar cast iron outside! Nodular vs lamillar ratio is 4 : 3

A solution could be to alleviate the storage problem to pack the parts in type F(H) film, so they can pack the parts when they are at about 50ºC.

4) Kartonplast: Hein wishes to receive samples, which have been sent in the meantime. A quote should follow as well.
16/09/2016 JEAN-MICHEL B : Absence de MME CHABANEL le jour du rdv le 19/07/2016

03/09/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Ben Evens

PP is introducing a new transmission the VT3, next to the VT2. Recently, there was a mix up at a client between the VT2 and VT3. PP asked Nefab if they could deliver a VCI bag in another color. This was not possible. So, they invited us to quote a bag for the VT3:
- VT2: 200K bags per year
- VT3: 150K bags per year

The Nefab version is slit sealed and 80 micron, delivered in boxes. The slit seal does sometime tear. I took 4 samples for strength testing at Zerust Excor.

Production at the Nanjing plant is going up rapidly. Back in 2012 about 500 sets were produced per day. Now, the are manufacturing 1.200 sets.

A disadvantage of working with the bag is, that it is for the employees, who work with greasy gloves, sometimes difficult to open the bag and this costs handling time. One of the questions raised was, if it is possible to produce a bag that is shorter on one side.

Procedure:
- evaluate quote
- perform a test with samples in house
- optional: CCT

28/10/2015 ANTHONY VZ : 


Meeting with Ben Renting

 

The mother company, Ballast Nedam, is in a critical state. The civil construction company has lost a great deal of many in the contraction of 2 highway projects in the Netherlands.

 

A Turkish company, Renaissance Construction, is in talks to take over the company and take it off the Dutch stock market. This would b the best that could happen to Rademakers. Financial security will be guaranteed and new investments could be commissioned in order to make the company more competitive.

 

Change of management

 

This year, Ballast Nedam put a new MD at the top who fired the production, maintenance and quality managers. The rejects of 8% are too high. After ¾ of a year, there has not been a significant improvement. Now, they will invest in the production process to optimize efficiency.

 

Corrosion problems

 

Corrosion turned from structural to occasional due to the cooling tunnel adjustments. Now, it is still a challenge to keep the cooling tunnel well programmed so smaller parts do not get too wet. Ben says that better teamwork inside the plant should solve this issue.

 

Subcontractors

 

PMA will be the main machine company for Rademakers. We know PMA, as Waeles already works with them.

 

VCI consumption

 

Volumes are going up rapidly, due to the following reasons:

-       neutral bags are replaced by VCI bags

-       Räder Vogel is ordering more

 

As a consequence, we should hold 1000 bags on stock instead of 500.

 

Price issues

 

In order to fence of competition and to compensate Rademakers for the increase in demand, we should work on lowering prices for 2016 at least by 5%. Otherwise, we risk to be challenged in a tender.

 

Financial issues

 

Ben wishes to increase the credit line to EUR 7,5 K, instead of 5K. He understands that we are tied to control the outstanding invoices closely, as we do not have any credit insurance. This issue will be resolved after the Turks take over the company.

27/10/2015 ANTHONY VZ :  


Meeting with Michael Scherpenzeel

 

The company has invested a lot of money and effort to organize itself around production cells instead of production lines. The result is that capacity ahs grown dramatically, while space is being minimized. On top, the company has invested in 3 state-of-the-art CNC machines to meet increased demand.

 

Main client for the spindles and cores is HP on a worldwide level. The Malaysian subsidiary, Coreteq, produces for the Asian market, while the Dutch plant serves EMEA and the US.

 

VCI consumption

 

Both in Holland and in Malaysia, VCI consumption is growing. Many parts are shipped in VCI form Holland, while all production is packed in VCI in Malaysia.

 

I will check if our local rep is supplying the company. Contact person for logistics, office and purchasing is Ms. Sidah.

 

Process liquids

 

Castrol used to be the main supplier. Due to skin irritation and environmental issues the company turned to the German process liquids supplier Zeller & Gämlin. Michael advised me to contact the Dutch rep, Evert Rook, as they are having increasing success with CNC suppliers. It is environmentally friendly and service is optimal.

 

New project

 

Michael wishes to protect internal storage rigs and boxes, as parts are sometimes stored over longer periods. Here, they experience corrosion issues. We will send a quote for a column and euro pallet application.

 

Future

 

Scherpenzeel is looking to invest in the US market as well, in order to be closer to irs clients.

11/05/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Andre Driesen on V180 sheets and bi-weekly deliveries

1) Rombout will test the V80 (35 ym) sheets this week for final approval. He would like he would like to receive the real values of the V180 sheets (35 ym) we send him for evaluation last December.

2) Caroline shoulñd send to Andre the current stock level of the V180 sheets old generation.

3) Prices for the V180 sheets (new generation) will be 8% cheaper. Cecile will send a quote with a price update. The discount is only applicable for the V180 sheers. This year we will work on more product optimization projects for the V450 film.

4) Acobal will ship every 2 weeks the high runners to VCST in order to lower their stock holdings. The packaging need is only for the Sint-Truiden plant. For the forecast, we could use the yearly quantaties (2016 = 2015 -10% ), which Andre will send to me.

5) In September 2016, we will present our packaging engineering capabilities to the VCST team.


03/12/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Andre Driesen and Kris Peetermans

1) Productivity gain 10%  for V180 sheets. The volumes are almost identical for the Belgian and Romanian site. Especially the V180F 900 x 650mm goes up to 350 K sheets per annum. The other size which comes very close is the 950 x 750 mm with 40K sheets. VCST wants to harmonize thes eproducts, as it will be easier to manage. Rombout Lenaerts will have to say wether this is possible. I do not recommend to increase the size for the smaller sheets, as this is economically not interesting.

As soon as the product is approved by VCST and the remaining stock is relinquished, we will switch over to the new V180 sheets thathave a thickness of 35 micron, instead of the 40 micron.

2) Storage value at VCST is on average EUR 20K. Managemnt strives to drop this to EUR 10 K. VCST has asked us to deliver in smaller Qs but more frequently. The local storage option would fit perfectly with their objectives for 2016 VCST on the other hand will give us a 6 month forecast to manage the volumes most effectively for both Belgium and Romania.

3) Forecast 2016: VCST expects to sell the same quantities as in 2015. The impact of the VW debacle is not clear yet and could have a negative influence on the volumes.

4) VCST has asked us to study direct deliveries to Romania. They have a couple to trucks going back and forward between the two plants, so this is most probably not economically viable.

5) The price increase for the Abrigo paper was aproved. i explained that the low quantities need higher prices. In the past orders were launched for 80K per run. Now, it is 20K.
 

12/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Leo Geuens

1) VCST de Mexico: Zenith production line. Leo brought back some samples of the Metpro bags used in Mecio. Samples will be send to Excor lab for appraisal. Conparative tests will be conducted to mark the quality standard of the Metpro film. It is still not very clear who the supplier is of this product; Metpro Intl. or some local abstract of the brand.

2) Productivity improvement program: Due to increased competition in Mexico, more pressure is omming upon us to look for lowering costs. Our propoasl is to present a thinner V180 sheets with the same strenght properteis- Alse will we propose covers in V380 version. Samples of both products have been disptched for appraisal.

3) Effective protection of VCI products: Is there a guideline for the VCI duration and optimal protection over time. How does the VCI sublimation rate work in the long run?

4) Due to the warm autumn, VCI bags and covers will be used longer than normal. during wintre period, due to reduced risk, these materials are not applied for low risk applications.

03/09/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Leo Geuens

1) VCST Mexico switched to Metpro, beginning 2015. 3 tests with  5 - 7 cycles were done, with ZE, Metpro and pilot. Results were ok, according to test results. After 3 requests, Leo had to allow them to switch to Metpro.

2) Price was a major issue, although other factors (read e-mail of Alejandro Ruiz of 18092015) als played a roll

3) Leo wants to receive information on difference between Metpro and ZE

4) The objective of VCST is to standardize the requirements. They establish the minimal requirements and if a product exceeds this it is approved.

5) VCST Alba: The sites in Germany, China and Mexico will operate more independently. The Romanian plant will be managed from VCST Belgium.

6) VCST China: no major corrosion issues anymore. Wash solution comes from Henke, as the used also a Chinese brand before. Leo does not know what VCI material is supplied.

7) Leo would like to be informed about new developments on our side. The stressed that prices will also have to be reviewed, as the category manager will do a benchmark between different VCI suppliers.

Passed the ISO14001 : 2004

03/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ :  Call with Frank Nijhoff

The cooling drum optimization projects was finished last week. The drum is more stable and there is less downtime. Frank will analyze if this has an impact on the corrosion incidents concerning ZF Sachs.

In January 2016, we will plan to do the following test with parts that stayed over the weekend in the cooling drum. We will do a corrosion test on parts that were 1, 2 or 3 times shot blast. Here, we can see if the extra time the parts spent in the drum has an impact on the surface and whether the skin is "cleaner" the more it was shot blast.

Orders keep pouring and their is no sight of the usual end of year blues.

Next week, Waeles will undergo an ISO certification audit

10/05/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Ali Cayir on Tectyle substitution project

We looked at the application in the packaging hall. Now, they are using Branofol film to pack the axls. As these need to be cut to size, the packaging process is labor intensive. Ali wishes to switch over asap to the VCI bags. I told him, as they are doing a price comparison with other suppliers., the mechanical values are too be watched closely. The film should be strong and sturdy to avoid tearing. 

We shipped samples last month, however 2 of the samples he tried up to now do not fit well.  We need to ship the following samples for dimensional testing purposes:

  • V450 A 400 x 500 mm
  • V510 A 1600 x 1300 mm

    Follwoing information will be sent to Ali:
    - Mechanical property tables of the Valeno films
    - Packaging instructions
    - Climate table for condensation risks

    In the meantime, Frederic Engelaere has launched a tender to 3 VCI suppliers. This needs to be doe for the purchase of every product.


    10/05/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Rik Beque

    The test with the ActivDri plugs from India to Belgium has not been done yet due to technical problems with the transmission itself. It will still take some more time, before the tranport can be organized. In the meantime, Rik would like to clarify 2 open issues:
    - Measurement of the plug
    - plastic caps

    The double sided tape will not be used for the moment, but could be tested in the near future and introduced as a product optimazation.
    In parallel, ZF is performing tests with the desiccant and ActivPak pouches drowned in oïl. This is to test whether the pouches will break Inside the transmission in case oïl is spilled ofer the plug.

    Rik wishes to haev a technical meeting to nail the open issues within the next 3 weeks.

    On a commercial level, ZF is promoting the use of the ActivDri plugs to its clients.In 2017, he expects the use of the plug to take off.

    13/01/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Rik Beque and Patrick Vandermeulen

    Plug ActivDri

 

Production problems at CP:

The mold does not retract well enough to extract the plug after injection. CP will have to redesign it partly.

- Current capacity is about 50 to 60 plugs per hour:

- Continuous process

- Per production run, a sample is taken for calibration

- Every 8 hours parts are being checked on quality issues

The inner and outer caliper (go/no-go) should be ordered to check the threading of the plug. Rik Beque will provide the information on caliper type.

All plugs will be dipped in cold water after production to strengthen the material in order to avoid Q problems at low temperatures

 

ZF will check 3 to 5 pieces every 500 plus.

 

We will have to supply 10 assembled plugs for testing from Coimbatore, India, to Lommel, Belgium. This is the last validation test before SOP.


04/12/2015 JEROME V : Email to Rik and Patrick with information about the project planning for first delivery. Information about the status of the injected plug (see annexes : Planning Information December 2015)

15/10/2015 ANTHONY VZ :  meeting with Jean-Pierre Huyberechts


Test program to eliminate oiling process

 

At current, the capacity at all of its plants is fully charged. Hence, processes are being outsourced to meet demand. Therefore, ZF started following projects with Acobal:

1.     Inbound flow: machining of parts is being outsourced to Forgital and ASFO in Italy. Each company had to  pack and ship 20 rings as follows: VCI film, ActivPak and desiccant. The tests started in August 2015 and results have been positive, Therefore, all shipments will be conditioned accordingly to eliminate RP application.

2.     Outbound. Parts were shipped to Gainesville US under the same spec. Regretfully, corrosion occurred.

 

The problem is, that the parts were not washed before packing. I mentioned that we usually work according to the following processes:

1.     Machining – Cleaning – Packing VCI

2.     Machining – DW RP – Packing VCI

By elimination in the last process the preservation process, parts become more vulnerable to corrosion, when the condition of the coolant is not optimal.

 

ZFWPA works with the 3-way protection system proposed by Quaker: light, medium and heavy. For oversees shipment, a wax is being applied. If parts had a clear destination from the start, the parts to the US could be protected with a light oil and VCI, so the washing at Gainesville is easier and becomes less costly. We need to think of a solution ere ¡in order to get our foot in.

 

Future opportunities are immense, as there will be a lot of back and forward shipment between the current ZF and new ZF plant (ex Bosch). If we can get the system to work with light oil or even without, this would open the door for a WW contract with ZFWPA.

2) Supply contract: this will be applied for all 4 worldwide sites.

3) ZF LR10: Patrick will send us the form, which we have to sign and return

4) NDA: was signed in September 2012. This is still valid.

5) Control docs Centre Plastique and Atelier Protégé: French language is ok.

6) ZF Group is pushing for EDI. ZFWPA cannot work according to this system. Acobal has to inform Patrick immediately upon reception of the letter from ZF Passau.

7) ZF SAM: includes check of Quality, Communication, Logistics, Engineering, Purchasing. Score is: A, AB, B, C. When the score is A, no check will be done in two years. In case of C, plan will be made with ZF in order to go to at B and later AB.

8) GMMOG audit: normally takes 3 days.

13/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Koen Merki, Elke van Gulck and Dirk Vercauteren

1) Comparative test ZE - Cortec
AC want us to do a CCT, as the cost for a test at an independent lab is very high. They would like to do the test with cast iron parts that come from the prodcution line. The test cycle would have to be as follows:
 - 2 wks stock at AC Antwerp
 - transport by boat to China
 - 4 months stock at AC Wuxi

On top, they wpuld like to receive test results for machanical properties as well. Excor will have to submit a test report with pix.

The AC team wants to visit the Excor lab in Dresden and go thorugh the test reuslts with our specialists

We will have to give a date that Andre can start the test , so they can prepare the test packaging. It will be about 2 stacked pallets


2) Oil compatibility test

The following two questions that AC posed me need immediate attention:

  1. What is the status of the compatibility test at Excor?
  2. Can we send 1000ml sample of the proposed oil, so AC can start their test program?

Apparently, AC wants to push this projects at high speed as it has senior’s managements attention. 


21/09/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Koen Merki and Wim Jaspers

1) Safecoat 66 substitution: The materials engineer set out 4 requirements for the RP:
    - Flashpoint > 130ºC, Safecoat 66 is 130 ºC, Perigol VCI230 is 100 ºC and too low
    - Compatible with Atlas Copco hydraulic oil (mineral group 1)
    - Viscosity should ideally be higher dan Safcoat 66
    - Tackiness should be sufficient, as in the case of Safecoat 66

2) It is important to know s well how much RP can cover what surface and what volume it can protect.

3) None of the substances should be present on the Atlas Copco blacklist

4) Current usage of Safecoat 66 per year is 500 l.

5) A test will be done at AC, where 1 to 2% of the RP will be dissolved in the AC hydraulic oil. Then following parameters will be checked:
     - foaming
     - air release
     - oxidation stability

6) Compatibility with other components inside is important. These are:
     - Viton is a brand of synthetic rubber and fluoropolymer elastomer commonly used in O-rings
     - HMBR: Hydrogenated (= 90% saturation) version of acrylonitrile-butadiene rubber, which shows improved stability and physical properties compared to standard NBR    
     - Loctite - inquire about type.

7) CCT at Dresden will be done when all the above steps have been approved.

27/02/2015 ANTHONY VZ : E-mail to Koen: Follow up technical visit of 10/02/15

In navolging van ons bezoek zou ik graag het volgende willen doen:

 

1. Test wasbad

We willen graag de chemische samenstelling hiervan testen om te bepalen of er oppervlakteverontreiniging kan plaatsvinden, zodat corrosie optreedt. Van de volgende vloeistoffen hebben we stalen nodig:

  • Leidingwater
  • Waswater
  • Spoelwater

We willen zowel het was- als spoelwater testen, net voordat het bad ververst of opnieuw aangelengd wordt. Op deze manier kunnen we bepalen, wat er onder de slechtste omstandigheid op het product kan achterblijven aan reststoffen. Weet U wanneer de volgende verversing van het was- en spoelbad gepland staat?

 

2. Castrol Safecoat 66

 

Kunt U bij Castrol navragen of de samenstelling van het product veranderd bij 80ºC? 

 

3. Werkwijze

 

We willen graag de nadruk leggen op het feit, dat er NIET met handschoenen gewerkt wordt. Dat zal zo snel mogelijk veranderd moeten worden, omdat op deze manier corrosievrij werken nagenoeg onmogelijk is. Wij raden het gebruik van Nitril handschoenen aan.

 

Graag hoor ik van U zodat we de volgende stappen kunnen zetten.

CT de ce jour 26/10/2016 :
Explication pour l’arrêt des ventes :
Mme Carrier m’explique que la technique est simple pour éviter de racheter des VCI : garder les sachets plastiques dans lesquels les pièces sont conditionnées et reconditionner avec ces sachets : Peut-être faut-il lui reparler de la péremption ?
D’autre part, pour les pièces les plus fragiles, l’ASN a recommandé de conditionner sous VCI de couleur noire pour protéger notamment de la lumière.
Elle serait intéressée par une proposition de notre part en couleur noire.
D’autre part, elle va faire le point mais il est possible qu’elle nous passe aussi une commande en VCI Jaune.

05/10/2016 JEROME V : Meeting with Frank Ten Tuscher about corrosion problems for parts produced at the CZ plant and delivered to Cirex BV. Corrosion after some weeks of storage.Most of teh parts are corroeded in the same Valno Type FH bags and some bags do not show any corrosion at all (same box and same batch). Corrodéd parts were taken (with and without corrosion) for surface analysis.
Meting also with Jeroen for the order problem. Cirex is out of stock suddenly for the second time (first time in June) due to SAP problem at Cirex. ACOBAL proposed a solution for a quick delivery. Cirex gave us the forecast for 2017 and 2018 for the Daimler parts. We will put that on our Cegid system and put an alert on place some weeks before to contact Cirex to be sure they will not forget to order from us on time. The timing for the alert will be decided after analysis of the forecast and the quantities per delivery. Géraldine has all document for the analysis (documents given by JV on monday 10/10).

02/03/2016 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Frank ten Tusscher

Issues discussed:

1) Old tray new cover misfit: We did not let Cirex know that the old tray would not fit with the new cover. To solve the issue, Cirex is using on the bottom the old tray and on top the other. There is a lot of extra work involved, as the flow of trays needs to be separated and well identified. This involves higher labor costs till the old trays have been used up.

To recover the trays and cut them to size at CTCI is also very costly. Frank suggested that some form of compensation would avoid frowning eyebrowse at Cirex and the problem would fade away. I told him that I will discuss this with JV

2) Frank expects to receive an 8D for the above mentioned problem, containing a etailed contrôle plan to avoid future mistakes.

3) Frank would like to know what the max shelflife is of the tray.

4) Deliveries to avoid production stop: CTCI will deliver 1920 trays and 910 covers on 15/03. The rest will be delivered 3 weeks later.

5) Ramp up production: AvZ will contact Jeroen Schabbink to set up a delivery plan for the next deliveries. Prodcution will ramp up rapidly and we need to have a larger order, that would be filledby several deliveries.

6) Direct shipment to Cirex CZ: in the near future CTCI will deliver FTL. Payments will still be done by Cirex NL.

 

11/11/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Frank ten Tusscher

1) Project 6195: Valves for Ford/PSA 1.4 l diesel engine
 
The parts will be deliverd to 3 plants in Europe. Volumes will run up to 5MM in 2019. The production process will have to be automated to handle such volumes. They have called in the help of a engineering company to perform a feasibility study:
      - https://www.demcon.nl/industrial/

The valves will be packed in Valeno covers per 100 to pack in the following box: KLT3212. This means that at the top, 50K bags will be needed.

The following quote and samples have been deliverd to Frank to start testing:
      - acobal - Cirex bv - 2015 10 06  - offer CG 15-686 (hzf 310x210x400 V320)

2) Feedback Daimler VCI trays

The covers deliverded in September were ok. There is an issue with the visual checking system of Cirex. The edges of the trays are not always the same. As the sensor uses the edges to focus on the items to be cehcked, the system is not working smoothly. Frank asked if it is possoble to fix 4 holesi each corner of the tray that can be used as a reference to fix the automatic visual sensors.

3) New project: cast iron (si, mo)

This type of cast iron is more susceptible to corrosion. Frank fears that this will have to protected by VCI bags or trays. The type of packaging is not clear yet.

4) Cirex will increase its production volume in Almelo by 50%. Construction of a new casting installation is under way. At the same time, the capacity in CZ will have to be increased accordingly to process the extra capacity.

01/07/2015 ANTHONY VZ : Meeting with Frant Ten Tusscher on new cover design

1) Experience with new cover:
- click is ok, Acobal can go ahead with order
- Frank wants tolérances indicated on drawing, x and y, so the sizes will not vary over time due to wear. Can CTCI do this.
- CTCI should test at their site after every production bath - control plan should be drawn up by CTCI
- Mould will be ready by early Sept. 2015
- delivery new cover by mid september 2015
- trays will be used for Daimler in Germany and Romania
- Acobal should send price for FTL to Cirex CZ
- Price cannot be changed due to raw material shortage. We will look at it in autumn, if prices have come down

2) validation test

Frank would lie to do a validation test with the new cover. This could be done together with the test for Componenta/Claas in week 33/34

CT 26/10/16 avec Mme Stein.

Nous avions procédé à des tests en enceinte climatique en 2014. Je vérifie avec elle si elle rencontre toujours ou plus des soucis de corrosion ou si elle a besoin de VCI pour de nouveaux projets.

Mme Stein me réexplique que grâce à nous, la cause potentielle a été détectée et qu’elle ne vient pas de l’emballage, qu’il n’est donc pas utile de changer.

Le problème a été éliminé largement.

Elle n’a donc pas de besoin mais saura faire appel à nous en cas de besoin pour d’éventuels autres projets où une protection VCI est nécessaire car elle est satisfaite de notre prestation


01/09/2014 ELODIE S : appel Mme Stein afin de connaître leur décision quant à l'utilisation des produits VCI suite aux essais en enceinte climatique. Les essais n'ayant pas mis en évidence de problème de corrosion, que ça soit conditionné sous VCI ou non, Stocko a décidé d'améliorer son dépôt de nickelage et de ne pas utiliser les VCI.

The visit was doen together with Roger Doerenberg from Componenta in order to get their parts packed in our VCI material. It seems that up to now they have been using Metpro material, although I did not see it in the factory. No VCI could be detected in the plant.

The VCI bags, which are the same as the standard size for Componenta, destined to CAT would have to be delivered by us directly. It is not clear what the quantities are going to be, as Componenta has passed no farecast yet. The hole JV between Ferromatrix and Componenta has to be defined yet.
